long_description:
My first texturepack! It'll add new textures but not the best! I hope you like it.

**Credits:**
[rpg16](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Hugues%20Ross/rpg16/) here i've got my cobble textures

[pixilart](https://www.pixilart.com/) is my new pixel-editor

[lospec](https://lospec.com/) was my old pixel textures 

Warning, this project is to time marked as pending for debiankaios, this means he don't make changes to time but it's on a Queue. This mark is only for debiankaios, means other people can continue all time.
name: simpletextures
short_description: It's adding texture, not the best.
title: SimpleTextures
